title: Asteria uses IBM Cloud and AI to forecast cashflow
caption: my name is Anders Nordquist and I'm CEO of Asteria so the business model is we sell smart cash flow to financial institutions and they in return they integrate this into their online bank and then they offer it to their existing small medium-sized local entrepreneurs everything we do we connect to a visual because that's what we believe strongly and that's what people want that's what people can connect and relate to we can go into a forest and we can see we can smell we can touch we can feel what is edible but when you work in IT you don't get the touch you don't get the smell you get the visual using visuals to enable AI or to enable people to access it that's key to what we do that means you get a visual of what banking products do for you and your business and that's absolutely unique today on the market we're a cloud native company we never had any other option or a will for that matter to put our data and hosting anywhere else than in the cloud no one can question the integrity of IBM as a cloud provider I think AI will revolutionize the world that's genuinely what I think it's not gonna happen over a day but in the next five to ten years we will see changes in anything from the public sector to small business owners to governments and large enterprises to save more time and to make people's lives easier [Music]
